resources.string:
Welcome 
 to your own PERK BLIND Voice Assistant 
 you can speak anything to write 
 Or 
 say Next to move next 
 Thank you.
This app requires Google Play Services. Please install Google Play Services on your device and relaunch this app.

This app requires your authorization to access your gmail account so that it can work.

We decided to develop an application that can assist visually impaired people to manage their gmail. With proper security. Perk Blind is an android mobile application which facilitates its users to manage there " Gmail" inbox on voice command user can send and recieve email in Perk Blind. not only this Perk Blind is able to narrate any email which is composed or received. Perk Blind gives you following features\; 
 
 * Voice Command Support 
 * QR Login 
 * Gmail Inbox Access 
 * Send and Receive Gmail emails 
 * Compose Email by speaking 
 * Listen Email through narration. 


 How to use Perk Blind? 
 First step to use this application is to register to Perk Blind using your valid gmail email address. After that you have to login to your gmail with the same email address. Allow the requested permissions. Now you are ready to manage you Gmail through Voice commands in Perk Blind. To Login with QR firstly you need to generate the QR code through the Settings option save that QR and use it to scan for loging in only valid QR can be used login the app.
